get.summary: Get list of transactions by block
Get transactions list by Minter address
Get rewards list by Minter address
Get slashes list by Minter address
Get reward statistics by Minter address

parameters.name: scale
parameters.description: Chart scale. Possible variants: minute | hour | day. Default is day

parameters.name: startTime
parameters.description: Chart start time. Formats: YYYY-MM-DD | YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS

parameters.name: endTime
parameters.description: Chart end time. Formats: YYYY-MM-DD | YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS

get.summary: Get list of delegations by Minter address
Get validator detail by public key
Get list of transactions by validator

parameters.name: scale
parameters.description: Chart scale. Possible variants: minute | hour | day. Default is day

parameters.name: startTime
parameters.description: Chart start time. Formats: YYYY-MM-DD | YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS. Default is 14 days before.

parameters.name: endtime
parameters.description: Chart end time. Formats: YYYY-MM-DD | YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS

part.description: Validator stake part of total stake

transactionsPerSecond.description: Transactions per second by last 24 hours

blockSpeed24h.description: Average block time in seconds by last 24 hours.

status.description: Explorer status. Can be: down | active

txPerSecond.description: Transaction speed per second by last 24 hours
